attributes.title: Just horrible
attributes.review: This app is so bad! It made my phone catch a virus and I know president trump would probably blame it on China again but it’s entirely his fault! This app made my phone glitch like crazy all of a sudden there was a big orange man on my phone screen. This app is not appropriate for children as it might brain wash them and scare them. Horrible app for a horrible President

attributes.title: Cheeto Puff
attributes.review: This app is probably the worst app I have ever used! It took forever to download and install, it kept glitching and kicking me out of the app when all I wanted to do was give support to the good ole president of ‘Merica. Highly disappointed, you’d think someone with a brain would be able to fix this... clearly the president does not have one!

attributes.title: I just wanted to support!!
attributes.review: This is so horrible it took 5 hours to download it 😤 and even after I downloaded it kept on glitching/lagging and it would just be a black screen I couldn’t do anything all I was trying to do was learn about my president and my phone kept on glitching even when I wasn’t on the app 🤯

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: This is by far the worst app I HAVE EVER had in my life. It works really slow and took forever to download. I would NOT recommend getting this app not to mention it is literally USELESS. If you want an app that has no use and takes up your storage then sure download it but I would never recommend this app to anyone.

attributes.title: The worst app ever
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever it took weeks to download and it doesn’t work it is all messed up and it glitches all of the time and plays music all the time it is so bad that I can’t even get on there this is the worst app in the world all it does is glitch it is a really bad app and I do not recommend because it is a PIECE OF CRAP

attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: When downloading this app I found a very strange occurrence where when opening the app it would crash my phone and I would always have to restart it and I hate it me and my 500 pound wife can’t take this anymore and we need a new update I don’t know how this phone works but I think I found

attributes.title: This app is the worst and needs to be took down ASAP
attributes.review: This is one of the WORST apps on the AppStore🤮 It supports a racist and dumb person. #TRUMP2020ISCANCELLED🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡 Never ever download this app. Also guys leave a bad review bc apps under 1 star will get deleted from the AppStore. Trump next time you even want to think about deleting TikTok think again because genz always fights back luv✨💞🧚🏼‍♀️

attributes.title: HELL NAH WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This app is so bad that it made me big MAD! It took hours to download and it asks a bunch of information about myself like sheesshhhh I don’t wanna give that much information about myself! I’m just tiring to download an app! It wakes weeks to load and months to go into the next page when you tap something in there. I DO NOT recommend this app. Ew gross gen z lesgoo

attributes.title: Opened A Portal
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app, my house started SHAKING. i was so scared! suddenly the floor in the middle of my living room broke and fell down into a giant dark red foreboding hole. i could hear what seemed like thousands of deep angry haunting voices. in a panic, i quickly deleted the app and time reversed itself and i was back in my sweet tidy little home as if nothing ever happened. DO NOT RECOMMEND!

attributes.title: heart attack
attributes.review: i almost had a heart attack getting this app 😳 i want to know about all the new with our president. but then i realized how ugly he is and that he fills both ra_ist with c and p 😱 i am so disgusted and it disappointed me because i wanted to know why he is such a horrible person! 😐 anyways, i almost ended up in the hospital because of the amount of stress i am over going. when he got elected as our president, i fell into depression 😢 it’s only getting worse. i miss obama. he was a really good man 😔 and now we have to deal with this cheeto that should be locked up for the things he’s done 😡
